adv_choke.message: Position your baby over your shoulder and burp adequately. If breathing or swallowing difficulty occurs, please consult your doctor immediately.

adv_mild_ignore_3_6.message: You may ignore mild cough that is not disturbing feeds. Consult your doctor if cough persists or is severe.

adv_mild_ignore_oil_3_6.message: Avoid oil baths. You may ignore mild cough not disturbing feeds. Consult your doctor if cough persists or is severe.

adv_watch_urine.message: Watch urine output closely; continue breast or formula feeds. Consult your doctor if cough persists or is severe.

care_6_12.message:
Cough Care (6–12 months):
If the cough is mild, monitor — no medicines needed.
If moderate:
👉 Alerid (Cetirizine) 2.5 ml at night × 3 days
👉 Levolin 2.5 ml, two times daily × 3 days
⏱️ If cough > 3 days or the child looks very tired/weak, consult your doctor.
Give plenty of liquids. Avoid fruit juices and cool drinks.

care_6_12_plus_fluids.message:
Give soup, kanji, curds, payasam, milk, dal, rasam or plain water (if >6 months). If breast fed, continue frequent breast feeds. Watch urine output closely.

Cough Care (6–12 months):
If mild, monitor. If moderate:
👉 Alerid (Cetirizine) 2.5 ml at night × 3 days
👉 Levolin 2.5 ml, two times daily × 3 days
⏱️ If cough > 3 days or looks very tired/weak, consult your doctor.
Avoid fruit juices and cool drinks.

care_1_3.message:
Cough Care (1–3 years):
If mild, monitor — no medicines needed.
If moderate:
👉 Alerid (Cetirizine) 5 ml at night × 3 days
👉 Levolin 2.5 ml, three times daily × 3 days
⏱️ If cough > 3 days or the child looks very tired/weak, consult your doctor.
Plenty of liquids; avoid fruit juices and cool drinks.

care_1_3_watch_urine.message:
Give soup, kanji, curds, payasam, milk, dal, rasam or plain water (if >6 months). If breast fed, continue frequent breast feeds. Watch urine output for the next 12 hours.

Cough Care (1–3 years):
If mild, monitor. If moderate:
👉 Alerid (Cetirizine) 5 ml at night × 3 days
👉 Levolin 2.5 ml, three times daily × 3 days
⏱️ If cough > 3 days or looks very tired/weak, consult your doctor.
Avoid fruit juices and cool drinks.

care_3_5.message:
Cough Care (3–5 years):
If mild, monitor — no medicines needed.
If moderate:
👉 Alerid (Cetirizine) 5 ml at night × 3 days
👉 Levolin 5 ml, two times daily × 3 days
⏱️ If cough > 3 days or the child looks very tired/weak, consult your doctor.
Fluids + steam inhalation; avoid fruit juices and cool drinks.

care_5_10.message:
Cough Care (5–10 years):
If mild, monitor — no medicines needed.
If moderate:
👉 Alerid (Cetirizine) 7.5 ml at night × 3 days
👉 Benadryl Cough Formula 5 ml, three times daily × 3 days
⏱️ If cough > 3 days or the child looks very tired/weak, consult your doctor.
Steam inhalation 3×/day; plenty of liquids. Avoid fruit juices and cool drinks.

care_10p.message:
Cough Care (≥10 years):
If mild, monitor — no medicines needed.
If moderate:
👉 Alerid (Cetirizine) 1 tablet at night × 3 days
👉 Benadryl Cough Formula 7.5 ml, four times daily × 3 days
⏱️ If cough > 3 days or the child looks very tired/weak, consult your doctor.
Steam inhalation 3×/day; plenty of liquids. Avoid fruit juices and cool drinks.
